div.p: Codes indicating the types of questions allowed in a questionnaire for evaluation of orders against guidelines.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/item-type

Exclude these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/item-type
CodeDisplay
referenceReferenceQuestion with a reference to another resource (practitioner, organization, etc.) as an answer
attachmentAttachmentQuestion with binary content such as a image, PDF, etc. as an answer

description.value: Codes indicating the types of questions allowed in a questionnaire for evaluation of orders against guidelines.

requirements.value: Limits the questions to the kinds of questions commonly supported by clinical decision support systems.
